data.message: New album please Marshall Hip-Hop needs it, also a reply to Slaughtermouse by Joey would be cool or even just jumping on a remix of it

replies.message: HE WON'T YET HE'S CONTENT AND HAPPY ENOUGH IN DOING WHAT HE'S DOING AT MOMENT HE SAID THIS HIMSELF RECENTLY IN INTERVIEW :) AND HE HAS TO FEEL PASSIONATE ENOUGH AS MUCH AS HE LOVES DOING MUSIC AND PRODUCING ETC LOL ALSO IT TOOK HIM A WHOLE YEAR TO GET EVERYTHING PERFECT AND HOW HE WANTS IT ON HIS LAST ALBUM :) :O
He has another album on the way he keepin quiet and will release wen no one is expecting it the next album has 50cdnt dre ect on it will be a banger no doubt
He's been working on a new album for a bit now I'm pretty sure 😁😁
